org.spongycastle.crypto.params

Class NTRUSigningPrivateKeyParameters.Basis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongycastle.crypto.params.NTRUSigningPrivateKeyParameters.Basis
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NTRUSigningKeyPairGenerator.FGBasis
    Enclosing class:
    NTRUSigningPrivateKeyParameters

    public static class NTRUSigningPrivateKeyParameters.Basis
extends java.lang.Object
    A NtruSign basis. Contains three polynomials f, f', h.

        Reads a basis from an input stream and constructs a new basis.
        Parameters:
        is - an input stream
        params - NtruSign parameters
        include_h - whether to read the polynomial h (true) or only f and f' (false)

        java.io.IOException
